attributes.action: Give the Government an open mandate to take the fight to ISIS worldwide.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-23892783 Parliament votes against action in Syria 

http://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-4623937,00.html Regional news reporting ISIS death toll above 200,000

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3319244/Video-reveals-horrific-moment-terrorists-opened-fire-crowd-music-fans-Bataclan-killing-89-people-shows-musician-hiding-drums-escape.html News showing aftermath of Paris attacks.
attributes.background:
The so called "Islamic state" and its allies are responsible for 200,000+ murders worldwide (Est). They have recently murdered 129 people on the streets of Paris 13/11/2015. 
We request Parliament allow the Government to use any force required to defeat this threat regardless of where is arises.
